remarks: The integral of a piecewise continuous periodic function ` F ` is unchanged if the domain is shifted by any positive value ` X ` .  This lemma generalizes ~ fourierdlem92 where the integral was shifted by the exact period.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:

fourierdlem108.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem108.t $e |- T = ( B - A ) $.
fourierdlem108.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR+ ) $.
fourierdlem108.p $e |- P = ( m e. NN |-> { p e. ( RR ^m ( 0 ... m ) ) | ( ( ( p ` 0 ) = A /\ ( p ` m ) = B ) /\ A. i e. ( 0 ..^ m ) ( p ` i ) < ( p ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) } ) $.
fourierdlem108.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
fourierdlem108.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. ( P ` M ) ) $.
fourierdlem108.f $e |- ( ph -> F : RR --> CC ) $.
fourierdlem108.fper $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR ) -> ( F ` ( x + T ) ) = ( F ` x ) ) $.
fourierdlem108.fcn $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ M ) ) -> ( F |` ( ( Q ` i ) (,) ( Q ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) ) e. ( ( ( Q ` i ) (,) ( Q ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
fourierdlem108.r $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ M ) ) -> R e. ( ( F |` ( ( Q ` i ) (,) ( Q ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) ) limCC ( Q ` i ) ) ) $.
fourierdlem108.l $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ M ) ) -> L e. ( ( F |` ( ( Q ` i ) (,) ( Q ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) ) limCC ( Q ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) ) $.
